metadata.synopsis: AD specifically for Minsc when you open the chest and see both of the weapons in Jaheira's basement
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Jaheira's Basement- Finish the elemental puzzle- Open the treasure chest

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: Aha, Jaheira's old weapons! They look strong as ever. Minsc should know - they gave him many bruises over the years.
